definition: enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out

sentences.english: Eco-fashion has certainly proved that it has enough caché in the fashion world.
sentences.chinese: 生態時裝還證明它在時尚界有着足夠的影響力。

sentences.english: If I have enought money, I will make a journey around the world.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有足夠的資金，我將完成一次環球旅行。

sentences.english: Sufficient space should be given to avoid mix-ups and cross-contamination.
sentences.chinese: 留有足夠的空間以防止混批和交叉污染。

sentences.english: Does the supplier have adequate equipment and facilities for performing ISIR's?
sentences.chinese: 供應商是否有足夠的設備進行樣品檢驗？

sentences.english: Did they take their full dose of ribavirin?
sentences.chinese: 他們服用的利巴韋林是否足夠？

sentences.english: Open doors can provide enough draft so that a fire can run wild.
sentences.chinese: 打開門會提供足夠的氣流更會使火勢蔓延。

sentences.english: If I want to buy a car, I have to offer enough money to get it.
sentences.chinese: 若我想買一輛車，便要支付足夠的金錢。

sentences.english: They're kinda cute when they're not quite big enough to trample you.
sentences.chinese: 當他們沒有長大到足夠攻擊你的時候，還是很可愛的。

sentences.english: In most instances, the default settings will suffice.
sentences.chinese: 在很多情況下，默認設置就已足夠。

sentences.english: Do you think MTR provide enough types of MTR shops?
sentences.chinese: 您認爲地鐵所提供的車站店鋪種類足夠嗎？

sentences.english: The direct artifacts and the affirmations are sufficient.
sentences.chinese: 直接工件和訪談證實就足夠了。

sentences.english: It may be sufficient to change the how.
sentences.chinese: 也許只要改變方式就足夠了。

sentences.english: Many children in the west don't have to go to school.
sentences.chinese: 很多西部地區的孩子沒有足夠的錢上不起學。

sentences.english: Bring your own drinking water as it is not always available in the field.
sentences.chinese: 應帶備足夠開水，因爲在野外通常都不會有供應。

sentences.english: Rabbit Garden Imperial Book Repository should obtain the descendant scholars' enough attention.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌本《兔園策府》應該得到後代學者的足夠重視。

sentences.english: We can do it later when we have more money.
sentences.chinese: 等我們有足夠的資金再做也不遲。

definition: enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
to be capable of/to be able to/can
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
